Sentencas: Conversion of steam to hydrogen in solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) is largely limited by concentration polarization occurring in the supporting cathodes.
Titulo: Reduced concentration polarization and enhanced steam throughput conversion with a solid oxide electrolysis cell supported on an electrode with optimized pore structure

Sentencas: The present study was thus aimed at reducing the concentration polarization and increasing the steam conversion by optimizing the pore structure of the cathodes.
Titulo: Reduced concentration polarization and enhanced steam throughput conversion with a solid oxide electrolysis cell supported on an electrode with optimized pore structure

Sentencas: Button cells supported on cathodes with straight pore structure showed much improved performance than those with tortuous pore structure especially under steam-lean conditions (1.19 vs. 0.69 A center dot cm(-2) at 1.3 V, 750 degrees C and 10% vol. % H2O).
Titulo: Reduced concentration polarization and enhanced steam throughput conversion with a solid oxide electrolysis cell supported on an electrode with optimized pore structure

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy analysis indicated that the straight pore structure in the cathodes allowed for facile transport of steam, thus effectively mitigating the concentration polarization.
Titulo: Reduced concentration polarization and enhanced steam throughput conversion with a solid oxide electrolysis cell supported on an electrode with optimized pore structure

Sentencas: The relation between the electrolysis current density and steam concentration determined from the button cells was used to simulate the electrolysis performance of single cells.
Titulo: Reduced concentration polarization and enhanced steam throughput conversion with a solid oxide electrolysis cell supported on an electrode with optimized pore structure

Sentencas: The simulation predicts that single cells with the straight pore structure in the cathodes can achieve high steam throughput conversion even at high steam feeding rate.
Titulo: Reduced concentration polarization and enhanced steam throughput conversion with a solid oxide electrolysis cell supported on an electrode with optimized pore structure
